profile:
I'm a 23 year-old, passionate backend developer, with a very deep interest in almost anything in the field of IT. I am currently employed as a backend developer at Diviso ApS in Viborg.

I work a lot with computers in my spare time and I spend a lot of time with immersing myself in something or learning something new.
title: Backend developer

methods.title: Processes
methods.content: In my schooltime, I have used SCRUM and Unified Process in multiple projects.

design.content: Good understanding about colors and the design-patterns of websites.

curiosity.content: I'm always looking for new things that I can use, so I can use them in practice.

systems.title: Windows and Linux
systems.content: I use Linux on all my devices and have done so for years. However, I still have a solid grasp with Windows and macOS.
